book.title: GT version Index Service: System Administrator's Guide

abstract.title: Introduction
abstract.para: This guide contains advanced configuration information for system administrators working with the WS MDS Index Service. It provides references to information on procedures typically performed by system administrators, including installation, configuring, deploying, and testing the installation.

important.simpara: The Index Service is built and installed as part of a default GT version installation. For basic installation instructions, see . No extra installation steps are required for this component.

chapter.title: Deploying
chapter.para: The Index Service is deployed into the Globus container by default during the standard toolkit installation.

chapter.title: Troubleshooting

para.emphasis: Problem: An index service entry has AggregatorConfig data but an empty AggregatorData entry.

chapter.para: Solution: There is probably something wrong with the registration. For example, a registration that uses QueryAggregatorSource aggregator source may have incorrect values for the resource's hostname or port number or a misspelled resource property name, or the remote resource may impose security restrictions that prevent the queries from the index from working. You can use the standard toolkit resource property query tools (such as ) to verify that the remote resource is responding.
